modName: Tales of Lycanthropy - Werewolf Overhaul - Chinese Translati
summary: This is the Chinese translation for the original Tales of Lycanthropy. Both Simplified and Traditional Chinese version are included.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]This is the Chinese translated version of the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12687]Tales of Lycanthropy - Werewolf Overhaul[/url]

All credit to the original author Brevi, and people he mentioned.[/b][/size]

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]Introduction[/b][/size][/color]

Tales of Lycanthropy  - Werewolf Overhaul makes the werewolf system in skyrim more playable. 

From original author Brevi:

This mod features the return of the Sanies Lupinus disease from Morrowind, moon based werewolf transformations (5 settings), new transformation animations (4 settings) with an easy to use configuration ring. The new re-written modules feature high stability and compatibility and were all designed to work together with the Dawnguard DLC.

[b]For more information, please refer to the original post, or read the instruction file.[/b]

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]Chinese Version Intro[/b][/size][/color]

I did two Chinese translation -- Chinese Simplified and Chinese Traditional. Please use it accordingly. Also I completely translate the original instruction, please read it for more information and features.

I did not put the [b]01_New werewolf model and textures - The Howling Natural[/b] and [b]02_New Werewolf Model and Textures - The Howling[/b] file here as they are not needed to be translated. If you want to use it, please download it from the original author\'s post (above link).

Here are two unedited full screenshots the author gives regarding the new model: [url=http://www.spwned.net/pics/skyrim/howling_a2/thehowling_naturalistic2.png][1][/url] [url=http://www.spwned.net/pics/skyrim/howling_b/thehowling.png][2][/url]

Thank DeepKu Skyrim Chinese Wiki for the game information I used in translation: [url=http://skyrim.deepku.com/]http://skyrim.deepku.com/[/url]

If you have any question for the Chinesization, pleas contact us: PM or skyrealm567@gmail.com

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

You must have the previous versions of Tales of Lycanthropy [b]FULLY[/b] uninstalled before adding any of the new modular content.

If you had the old TOL installed before, then a new game is highly recommended, but a [b]CLEAN SAVE[/b] is the minimum requirement.

For uninstalling, just delete the files pertinent to this mod.

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

The Core and the SKSE plugins are highly compatible with any other mod.
The new modules were all designed to work together with the Dawnguard DLC, but they will work fine with vanilla Skyrim as well. Dawnguard is fully tested with the mod and everything is functioning well.

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]About Optional Files[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Companion Circle Followers Redone[/size]

This addon is no longer supported.

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]Credit[/b][/size][/color]

The original Mod author: Brevi from the www.spwned.net gaming community.
Jeremy Hamilton - Werewolf textures.
His tester: Maryen.

Morrowind McAsmod werewolf mod team for the sound & music files. Here is their website: [url=http://werewolves.skaarj.com/]http://werewolves.skaarj.com[/url]
Full list of credits of the original McAsmod here: [url=http://werewolves.skaarj.com/index.php?bg=1&page=credits]http://werewolves.skaarj.com/index.php?bg=1&page=credits[/url]
Note however that none of the original McAsmod team members worked on this mod.

Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit.

If you like this mod, please endorse the author, thank you :)

[color=#FF0000][size=4][b]About our group[/b][/size][/color]

[b]SkyreaLm[/b], founded on April 1st, 2012, is a neutral independent mini-group for MOD lovers, not belonging to any other organization or individual. We will really appreciate if you share your MOD Chinesization experience~ However, currently we do not accept any stranger\'s entering.

If you have any good idea about Chinesization, please contact us.

Our contact information: skyrealm567@gmail.com

OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: Aimee
